meanings.definition: Extremely competitive or eager to succeed
meanings.sent1: The supercompetitive team trained hard to win the game.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her supercompetitive nature in sports.
meanings.sent3: The supercompetitive squirrel raced the other animals for the acorn.
meanings.sent4: His supercompetitive spirit was like a blazing fire on the field.
meanings.sent5: The supercompetitive atmosphere in the office motivated everyone to do their best.

meanings.definition: Characterized by fierce rivalry or intense competition
meanings.sent1: The supercompetitive market led to price wars between companies.
meanings.sent2: The two supercompetitive siblings always tried to outdo each other.
meanings.sent3: The supercompetitive cats fought over the best spot in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The supercompetitive race to the finish line was exhilarating to watch.
meanings.sent5: The supercompetitive nature of the industry pushed innovation to new heights.
